alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 09 at 7:22AM CST until January 09 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTRY WEATHER CONDITIONS IMPROVING WITH TIME TODAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Lingering blowing and drifting snow. North-northwest winds still gusting 30 to 40 MPH this morning, but very slowly decreasing with time, especially this afternoon. * WHERE...Portions of north central Kansas and central, east central, and south central Nebraska. * WHEN...Until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Although most all falling snow has ended, continued strong north-northwest winds this morning will result in continued blowing snow, which could still reduce visibility and cause near-blizzard conditions, especially in open, rural areas. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday morning commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
